title: Beau Bold-like Font
content:
I'm looking for this font that is similar to the Beau Bold font. However, Beau Bold is not this font.

thanks for any assistance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130602im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Jaguars%20Font_5025.jpg)

Font: 

 Motor Oil 1937 M54 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130602/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: rubytuesday13

comments.content: It looks like a Dafont font with the strange name **[Motor Oil 1937 M54](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130602/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Motor%20Oil%201937%20M54%20-%20Regular&fid=630ad184f803d1b39bd4aaf287860156&fsize=60&text=JAGUARS&wrap=2)** by Mohammed Rahman (2009, Free for personal use)
